message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,100,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,100,000 is still a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,175,000? I'm confident this price reflects the value of the product for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I believe $1,175,000 is still quite high for me. I am willing to go up to $1,150,000 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
